title._content: Mr. Hancock On The Loading Ramp At The Gibson Mine

description._content: 1911 12.7 x 17.8 cm 1 Black and white photograph Wagon being filled with coal from a loading ramp at the Gibson Mine. Mr. Hancock is on the ramp. Proper name of the mine owner was Johathon James Mills. For more information about the Gibson and Little Wonder Coal Mines, see ERCB Coal Mine Atlas: Operating and Abandoned Coal Mines in Alberta, second edition (Calgary, 1988), available in the Archives. The donor obtained these copy photographs from Mary Turnbull. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19881042014
